name: My Car Salon Pro
storyline:
Wrench and the gang are back to fire up more cars in the sequel to the mammoth hit My Car Salon! All the customers from the first game have been served, the dust has settled, and now Wrench and his colleagues want to turn their auto service center into a global empire!

Wrench, Lube, Socket, Flat, Ratchet, Pliers, Torque, and Hammer now run nine branches of their popular car salon. With new recruits to be added and better equipment to keep cars in top shape, the vehicles that pass through this salon are in for one heck of a ride! Can our brave mechanics meet the demand and live up to their reputation? Time to check the oil and find out in My Car Salon Pro!
